question: Which insurance company launched the ‘Business Kisht Suraksha cover’?
explanation:
HDFC ERGO General Insurance has recently introduced Business Kisht Suraksha cover. It is a unique cover which aims to protect the balance sheet of MFIs, financial institutions and banks in the event of a natural disaster.
It covers the institutions from the non-payment of EMIs by borrowers, resulting out of listed calamities.
